trait.name: Dual Shields
entries: The giant carries two shields, which together give the giant +3 to its AC (accounted for above).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Fireshield or Rock attacks.

action.name: Fireshield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shield Charge {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant moves up to 30 feet in a straight line and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Huge. The first time it enters a creature's space during this move, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or take 36 ({@damage 8d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and be pushed up to 30 feet and knocked {@condition prone}.
